info.description: This API can be used by client application to manage and retreive information about identities quality.
info.title: Identity store quality API

post.summary: Get a paginated list of suspicions, according to criteria specified in the request

parameters.name: Request body.
parameters.description: The suspicious identity search request

parameters.name: client_code
parameters.description: Client code of the requester that is used to validate every request over its service contract

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Name of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: author_type
parameters.description: Type of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: application_code
parameters.description: Application code of the requester. If sent, the adequation between the client code and this application code will be verified.

400.description: The request could not be understood by the server due to incorrect syntax. The client SHOULD NOT repeat the request without modifications.

401.description: The request requires user authentication information. The client MAY repeat the request with a suitable Authorization header field.

404.description: No resource matching the request coud be found

post.description: The creation is conditioned by the service contract definition associated to the client application code.

parameters.name: Request body
parameters.description: An Identity Change Request

parameters.name: application_code
parameters.description: Application code of the requester. If sent, the adequation between the client code and this application code will be verified.

400.description: An error occurred during the treatment. with explanation message

get.summary: Get full list of duplicate rules

parameters.name: author_name

400.description: An error occurred during the treatment. with explanation message

get.summary: Get list of identities that are duplicates of the provided customer_id's identity, according to the provided rule ID.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: the id of the customer

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: the code of the rule

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Name of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: author_type
parameters.description: Type of the author that signs the request

parameters.name: application_code
parameters.description: Application code of the requester. If sent, the adequation between the client code and this application code will be verified.
